mapper.select:
SELECT a.a_id, a.t_id, a.a_even, a.a_leave_time, a.a_create_time, a.a_state,a.u_id,a.a_submit , adcd.a_d_explain aDExplain,adcd.a_d_price aDPrice,adcd.c_d_name cdName, u.u_name as uName, ta.t_name aName
FROM type_apply ta INNER JOIN (SELECT * from apply WHERE apply.a_state != "已终止" and apply.a_state != "已审批" and apply.a_state != "待审批" ) a ON ta.t_id=a.t_id INNER JOIN (SELECT * from `user` WHERE `user`.d_id=#{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER} And `user`.Professional_id != 2 AND `user`.Professional_id != 3 AND `user`.Professional_id != 4 ) u ON u.u_id = a.u_id INNER JOIN (SELECT ad.a_id,ad.a_d_price,ad.a_d_explain,cd.c_d_name from account_dispatch ad INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM category_dispatch ) cd ON cd.c_d_id= ad.c_d_id) adcd ON adcd.a_id = a.a_id

SELECT a.a_id, a.t_id, a.a_even, a.a_leave_time, a.a_create_time, a.a_state,a.u_id,a.a_submit ,
u.u_name as uName, ta.t_name aName ,
d.dName dName,d.pName pName,d.disdName,d.dispName,d.dispatch_create_time dcTime,d.p_id pId, d.dispatch_p_id dpId,d.d_id dId,d.dispatch_d_id disdId
FROM type_apply ta INNER JOIN (SELECT * from apply WHERE apply.a_state != "已终止" and apply.a_state != "已审批" and apply.a_state != "待审批" ) a ON ta.t_id=a.t_id INNER JOIN (SELECT * from `user` WHERE `user`.d_id=#{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER} And `user`.Professional_id != 2 AND `user`.Professional_id != 3 AND `user`.Professional_id != 4 ) u ON u.u_id = a.u_id INNER JOIN (SELECT dis.* ,de.d_name disdName ,p.Professional_name dispName ,de2.d_name dName,p2.Professional_name pName FROM dispatch dis INNER JOIN (SELECT d_name,d_id from dept) de ON de.d_id = dis.`dispatch_d_id` INNER JOIN (SELECT Professional_id,Professional_name from professional) p ON
p.Professional_id = dis.dispatch_p_id INNER JOIN (SELECT d_name,d_id from dept ) de2 ON de2.d_id=dis.d_id INNER JOIN (SELECT Professional_id,Professional_name from professional) p2 ON p2.Professional_id= dis.p_id) d ON d.a_id = a.a_id

select u.u_name as uName,ta.t_name aName, a.a_id, a.t_id, a.a_even, a.a_leave_time, a.a_create_time, a.a_state,a.u_id,a.a_submit FROM apply a INNER JOIN type_apply ta ON ta.t_id=a.t_id INNER JOIN `user` u ON u.u_id=a.u_id

SELECT a.a_id, a.t_id, a.a_even, a.a_leave_time, a.a_create_time, a.a_state,a.u_id,a.a_submit , u.Professional_id, u.u_name as uName,ta.t_name aName
FROM type_apply ta INNER JOIN (SELECT * from apply WHERE apply.a_state != "已终止" and apply.a_state != "已审批") a ON ta.t_id=a.t_id INNER JOIN (SELECT * from `user` WHERE `user`.Professional_id = 2 OR `user`.Professional_id = 3 OR `user`.Professional_id = 4 ) u ON u.u_id = a.u_id

SELECT a.a_id, a.t_id, a.a_even, a.a_leave_time, a.a_create_time, a.a_state,a.u_id,a.a_submit , adcd.a_d_explain aDExplain,adcd.a_d_price aDPrice,adcd.c_d_name cdName, u.u_name as uName, ta.t_name aName,p.process_id processId
FROM type_apply ta INNER JOIN (SELECT * from apply WHERE apply.a_state != "已终止" AND apply.a_state ="待审批") a ON ta.t_id=a.t_id INNER JOIN (SELECT * from `user` WHERE `user`.Professional_id = 1 ) u ON u.u_id = a.u_id INNER JOIN
(SELECT ad.a_id,ad.a_d_price,ad.a_d_explain,cd.c_d_name from account_dispatch ad
INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM category_dispatch ) cd ON cd.c_d_id= ad.c_d_id) adcd ON adcd.a_id = a.a_id INNER JOIN
(SELECT * FROM process p INNER JOIN (SELECT u.u_id,u.u_name,u.Professional_id,p.Professional_name from `user` u INNER JOIN (SELECT Professional_id,Professional_name FROM professional WHERE Professional_name ="销售部经理" OR Professional_name ="项目开发部经理" OR Professional_name ="人事部经理") p ON u.Professional_id=p.Professional_id) users ON users.u_id = p.process_deal_u_id ) p ON p.a_id = a.a_id

SELECT a.a_id, a.t_id, a.a_even, a.a_leave_time, a.a_create_time, a.a_state,a.u_id,a.a_submit ,
u.u_name as uName, ta.t_name aName ,
d.dName dName,d.pName pName,d.disdName,d.dispName,d.dispatch_create_time dcTime,d.p_id pId, d.dispatch_p_id dpId,d.d_id dId,d.dispatch_d_id disdId ,p.process_id processId FROM type_apply ta INNER JOIN (SELECT * from apply WHERE apply.a_state != "已终止" AND apply.a_state ="待审批" ) a ON ta.t_id=a.t_id INNER JOIN (SELECT * from `user` WHERE `user`.Professional_id = 1 ) u ON u.u_id = a.u_id INNER JOIN (SELECT dis.* ,de.d_name disdName ,p.Professional_name dispName ,de2.d_name dName,p2.Professional_name pName FROM dispatch dis INNER JOIN (SELECT d_name,d_id from dept) de ON de.d_id = dis.`dispatch_d_id` INNER JOIN (SELECT Professional_id,Professional_name from professional) p ON p.Professional_id = dis.dispatch_p_id INNER JOIN (SELECT d_name,d_id from dept ) de2 ON de2.d_id=dis.d_id INNER JOIN (SELECT Professional_id,Professional_name from professional) p2 ON p2.Professional_id= dis.p_id WHERE dis.d_id != dis.dispatch_d_id) d ON d.a_id = a.a_id INNER JOIN
(SELECT * FROM process p INNER JOIN (SELECT u.u_id,u.u_name,u.Professional_id,p.Professional_name from `user` u INNER JOIN (SELECT Professional_id,Professional_name FROM professional WHERE Professional_name ="销售部经理" OR Professional_name ="项目开发部经理" OR Professional_name ="人事部经理") p ON u.Professional_id=p.Professional_id) users ON users.u_id = p.process_deal_u_id ) p ON p.a_id = a.a_id

a.a_id, a.t_id, a.a_even, a.a_leave_time, a.a_create_time, a.a_state,a.u_id,a.a_submit
